entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WATCH , Bracebridge
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:46 AM EST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -14.2°C

entry.title: Monday: Flurries. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Flurries beginning early this afternoon. Risk of snow squalls late this afternoon. Local amount 5 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h this morning then becoming west 20 gusting to 40 early this afternoon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 19 this morning and minus 10 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy. Risk of snow squalls this evening. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 6.
